name: coinbase_scrape_asset_page
description: Scrape detailed info for a crypto asset on Coinbase including price, market cap, volume, and description.

steps.code: const name = document.querySelector('h1')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const price = document.querySelector('[class*="Price"], [data-testid*="price"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const stats = {}; document.querySelectorAll('dt').forEach(dt => { const dd = dt.nextElementSibling; if (dd) stats[dt.textContent.trim().toLowerCase()] = dd.textContent.trim(); }); const about = document.querySelector('section p, [class*="About"] p, [class*="description"] p')?.textContent?.trim()?.substring(0, 1500) || ''; const links = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('a[href*="http"][rel]')).slice(0, 5).map(a => ({ text: a.textContent.trim(), url: a.href })); return { asset: '{{asset_slug}}', name, price, stats, about, links, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
